TopicTitle: When I try to go to earlier versions than 1.3.1, none of them start...

Articles.Content: For whatever reason, I can't go to earlier versions than 1.3.1. The game just gets stuck on loading screen and wouldn't load. Could I have some help? How can I fix this?
Do you have mods installed and are they the correct version; compatible with that version of KSP?
If you can upload a log file somewhere and post a link here, that might also help in narrowing down the issue.
